website_summaries.verdict: Has a lot in the way of looks and versatility for the price. Serta offers a solid value with this attractive sofa.
pros: Spacious build and stylish, contemporary corduroy fabric
cons: Back cushions are a bit too thick for some consumers
Some reports of the middle being too soft

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews I expected a nice, but smelly couch that would have unmanageable cushions and misaligned hardware. I appreciate the cautions of others because it made me take extra care to follow directions. I also watched the video that was on the Amazon website. I put the sofa together alone in about an hour while my grandson was napping. I live on the first floor, so I didn't have trouble with stairs. The sofa is a little less deep than I anticipated, but it is very comfortable and fits well in my apartment. It does have a little chemical odor, but it is fading after only a few hours. For the money spent, this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Truly regret this purchase.  Will never order online furniture again.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given -0- stars to all of the categories but I could not submit without giving at least one star. If there was a "negative star" option, I would have chosen that. Starting with the shipping material that opened and spilled thousands of tiny little beads all over our floor when taken out of the box, to nothing aligning correctly in order to assemble, to the frustrating outcome of a small and ugly loveseat. Extremely disappointed in this product is an understatement. Serta should be ashamed of themselves. I have to find some way to brighten up our living room now that this sub par piece of overpriced furniture has darkened my doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to Love It. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is all the things it claims to be except my seat cushions did not (re)inflate. It has been a week and they look like they are old and flat. Luckily, Amazon is working with me on the return. I no longer have the box, Amazon says no problem. It weighs over 100 pounds, Amazon says no problem. They are sending a company to my home with a box to pick it up! This is why I purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I trusted the name Serta, I was mislead. This product is terrible. Has not even been a year and the cushions are out of shape, both sink onto the middle of the couch, very uncomfortable. Sadly it's going into the trash. By the way, I am the only one using this couch, I am not over weight, not messy, bought for my motor home to replace the couch which was in their, so not used much.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: This couch sucks. I bought it for Hubby's man cave knowing it wouldn't be used much. But the zipper on one of the cushions busted just putting the thing together. The couch itself is very uncomfortable. It's just awkward to sit on. I'm 5'2" and my husband is 5'10" and we both think it's uncomfortable. I would return it but it's more of a hassle to do so. I'll definitely buy nicer furniture the next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Uncomfortable, so shallow, such a rip off.
customer_reviews.text: I got this couch on sale and was so excited to add it to my small space living apartment. My excitement dwindled quickly. The couch is so shallow, you feel like you’re about to fall off of it the entire time. The cushions are attached to the back with Velcro, and that sweet ripping noise when you move doesn’t ever go away, and it’s just overall too firm, never got comfortable, and was so much less than I’d hope for. Now my best hope is to sell it secondhand. Serta has a good reputation, this couch doesn’t serve it well. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for Occasional Seating but Unresponsive Customer Service for Defective Products
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent loveseat for occasional sitting, as long as it doesn't arrive defective. Mine arrived with a broken seat cushion zipper. I've spent the last month trying to find someone who can tell me how to get a new cover but so far no luck. Amazon was helpful enough to give me the manufacturer's name (my shipment came with no documentation or instructions), but the only response I received from the manufacturer is to say my email was forwarded to their "online care team"; that was two weeks ago. The seat itself has a 1 year warranty, but good luck getting that honored.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Waters

customer_reviews.title: This couch is great!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase is item given the reviews. The price had me concerned as well. I was thinking this item would break within the 1st year. I was wrong. We will know have owned this item for 2 years in December and it is great. The pictures are presemt day after owning for 1.5 years. We have had multiple family members sleep on it while visiting. The cushions could be more firm, but that is my preference. The covers are machine washable and easy to remove. The cushions are lightweight and also easy to remove to cleaning when our children make messes. The the price we paid I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: much better than expected. i have a very high house on cement posts, we flooded and i wanted new furniture that wasnt heavy. we live along the amite river in the baton rouge area. i do not want heavy back breaking furniture any more. this product comes in bolt together sections which i brought upstairs each seperate trips. i just purchased another one on sale the next day because i think they are great. its not long enough for a 6ft 2 guy like me to sleep on, but its nice and solid. i would give it 5 stars but the length was a few inches shorter than our flooded couch. good luck brian in baton rouge.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Rotten wood arm supports!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the first one and the arm supports literally caved in. It felt and sounded like rotten plywood. We sent back. Got a replacement. The second one did the same dang thing!! Only now we are stuck with the stupid couch!! Too late for our 30 day guarantee. Obviously defective or rotten wood support!! What a cheap piece of crap!!
customer_reviews.author: RaH

customer_reviews.title: Screws missing the main thing the whole couch up in the middle very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well the couch arrived very much on time I put everything together cushion everything at the end they were like five screws missing the whole the middle of the couch or missing totally missing so I have to wait now to put it together see why get a hold of they can send me the screws that I need to hold the couch up or if not it’s no use.DONT BUY IT COMES WITH MISSING Screws And I called numbers it comes with no one can help so now I have to go buy them at Home Depot DONT BUY LOVESEAT .
customer_reviews.author: sylvia ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Utterly worthless. Don't spend your money on this temporary at best, uncomfortable couch.
customer_reviews.text: Owned for one year, and very rarely used (it's in a room we only use once a week for a movie). Each arm has broken down pit-holes where your elbow or hand would go. The foot in the center of the couch has broken, taking a large chunk of the center beam with it, ruining the support of the couch. The seat cushions don't stay on the base, meaning whenever you get up they flop out onto the floor. The back cushions are a lumpy, uncomfortable, oblong mess making the functional seat about 12 inches deep, so you have to sit straight up defeating the point of a couch.
customer_reviews.author: boilingsky

customer_reviews.title: Comfy cushions but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The couch arrived in a neatly wrapped large box. Assembly was relatively easy, as there are minimal pieces to put together. The directions are clear. All cushions are super comfortable and the material is very soft to the touch. The color is a beautiful soft gray. **However, one of the pillows has already fallen apart after 2 weeks of use. Also the wooden frame on the upper, back left of the couch broke instantly after the first sitting. While the cushions are comfy, the wood frame of the couch is not sturdy. Overall, I'm not sure this couch is worth the price because I don't know if it will withstand years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Nononorra

customer_reviews.title: Good couch for cheap
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I ordered this couch back in October, and although were very weary due to some reviews, it hasn't disappointed! Yes, the back Velcro bit is crap and doesn't really stick, but overall the cushions have held up with constant use. The back cushions are the only thing that really peeves me, as the stuffing tends to gravitate to the bottom, but it's nothing a good fluffing can't fix. If you're looking for a decent piece of furniture to hold you over for a few years until you can afford a great sectional, this is the way to go. We are considering purchasing the love seat; that in itself says something!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Kimbrell

customer_reviews.title: Confortable sofa for your living room.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece, of furniture! It s. great for taking small naps. as well as long naps! Or just relaxing On it - we even thinking of getting another one since our area needs to get filled with. More Furniture as great as this sofa!!! We re very happy - and assembly didnt take longer that 30-40 minutes MAX! It was very easy to follow instructions on how to get this sofa put together with out any major. tools.
customer_reviews.author: Anna22345

customer_reviews.title: A bit too soft
customer_reviews.text: The cushions are underfilled and soft. They don't stay nice and square. The seat cushions are so soft, you just sink in, and are a bit small. Even though the set cushions have velco, they shift due to their size, and leave a gap in the middle. The back cushions just sit there like pillows. I added a 1.5 inch layer of memory foam. That has helped. I'm not happy with it, but not unhappy. I'm just "MEH" with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon Warehouse for under $250 and for that price what a deal! I’m 5’7” and can law down on the sofa with my head on the armrest or not. The cushions are comfy, not firm or too soft. Assembly was easy. The seat back comes up to my shoulders, seat portion goes from my back to knees. Big enough but small enough for small living room. The colors & material are kinda 70’s looking but soft.
customer_reviews.author: BeachBum

customer_reviews.title: This sofa is pleasant enough and pretty comfortable. We ran into a problem attaching one ...
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is pleasant enough and pretty comfortable. We ran into a problem attaching one side of the back to the arm because the holes didn't line up right, so that slowed us down for quite a while. Otherwise it's pretty easy to put together. I ordered two loveseats and they came separately. Though the color was the same their construction was different. One having the back and body in two sections that had to be put together with legs in the middle and for the other one the back and bottom were one piece, no additional legs. I was able to use them just fine, but it was a bit of a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy, and I thought the way it was packaged ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bonded leather loveseat. At first, I thought it was novel that a loveseat could be delivered to my door, and I could put it together. Assembly was easy, and I thought the way it was packaged was ingenious. This could have been a 4 star item but the all of the cushions moved around. There were no features to velcro the cushions down to keep them from sliding around. Then, about a couple weeks later, the zipper broke on one of the seat cushions. If the duct tape doesn't hold up, I may have to find someone who can repair it. Otherwise, it's going in the trash. Too bad because I thought it was a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Already broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had it but a year and it’s broken. Never been rough with it. It’s in a house with only adults and only two people have sat on it at one time. Really disappointed because I loved it when I first got it. The color is beautiful and it’s the perfect size for my small apartment. Unfortunately it wasn’t worth the money considering it broke so quickly. I’d say skip this and splurge on something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery; pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I live in an up stairs apartment with fairly narrow walk ways. Delivery was super-fast; like three days. Delivered right to my door step undamaged. Easy to get out of the box. Very compact. Took about an hour from start to finish to put together. Not a very deep couch. Quality is fair for the price. The legs are cheap plastic. No tools needed. The back cushions don't attached with I don't like. They just sit on top of the seat cushions. I'm just going to Velcro them so it should be an easy fix. Seems pretty comfortable and looks nice enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robley

customer_reviews.title: Stupid looking
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the difference between the sofa in the picture, and the sofa we have before us now. Is this a joke? The cushions are so thin and saggy, and the cushion cases are different dimensions from the cushions. This sofa looks old and used straight out of the box. It’s not comfortable and not pleasing to look at. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CMI

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushions are removable so they often move a little if you move too much.
customer_reviews.text: My delivery was a week late, problem with the shipping route I'm guessing, but it was worth the wait since it was able to be delivered in a box (delivery hassle saver) and is Very comfortable and the perfect size for my apartment, looks exactly as advertised photo, very good price for a serta, only problem I have though is pushing seat cushions back in place all the time, if I move around too much. I'd ALMOST recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DHarp

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: This product came packed in a box and was not hard to put together. The seat area is short with the back cushions put on. It is hard to sit on and forget laying on it. Bad purchase for the price. I will never order furniture on line again. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Moore

customer_reviews.title: Parts don’t align.
customer_reviews.text: The parts didn’t slot together exactly right. Yep people trying for over an hour and it became clear that metal brackets were just not centered well. I kept because it’s fir holiday home and I can push it up against the wall and hope for the best but I would NOT recommend this product. Looks awful, pretty uncomfortable as it says on day three and the back of it is out of alignment. I’d be amazed if I get two years worth of slight use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: You can get a real sofa at this price from a chain store, and I suggest you do it.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, easy to assemble, not going to last. Color is good, size is good. Couch is NOT firm, cushions cannot be flipped, we'll see how long it lasts for our family and pets. Don't buy if the back of the sofa will show, it's only velcroed together. Don't buy if you want a quality piece of furniture. This is a dorm room piece, for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Pixxiedust922

customer_reviews.title: Good little love seat.
customer_reviews.text: We just got this today and it fits exactly where we wanted it to and so far it's great. I think if I am going to lounge or if I want to stretch out I might be more comfortable to take the back cushion off and just use one of the throw pillows. I think I read it only took two people half an hour to put together seems extreme to me. It took my dad and I over an hour. But so far it is going to be perfect for why we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole J Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Stylish, Easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sofa for the break room at my job. Assembling was simple and easy. Struggled momentarily with getting the thumb bolts to align with the correct holes, but other than that, no complaints. This sofa is very plush & comfortable! Upon unboxing it I was very skeptical, but once everything was put together I realized how first impressions can be deceiving. Highly recommended for the budget friendly shoppers or new homeowners with small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: tam johnson

customer_reviews.title: We returned-- least comfortable couch ever
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this couch and were so excited when it arrived. Set up was easy enough, and once we finished (took maybe 30 minutes total) we were so excited to test the couch out. Once we sat on it, we were shocked by how uncomfortable it was. You couldn't sit back properly, because the back cushions felt like they were pushing us off. It also looked a bit off. We were not expecting anything fancy-- but the appearance was pretty cheap looking. Fortunately, we were able to return. Two stars go for easy set up and fair return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K

customer_reviews.title: Nice couch.  Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Nice couch. Easy to put together. Didn't have to look at the instructions. I'm 6'-1" so it was a little low so I got some 3" risers now it's perfect. I just wish they put velcro on the back cushions. They fall over when you get up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zoscak

customer_reviews.title: starter couch
customer_reviews.text: Had a bad smell when the cushions were opened. Cushions are vacuum sealed.: takes a little more than 2 days for the cushions to take there natural shape.. you’re gonna get 300 worth of quality. I wanted to send it back day 1 but didn’t want to disassemble it to return.. took about 1hr to assesmble alone .. I’m a woman 5’2 with no stamina and I assesmble this alone
customer_reviews.author: Shayna

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product came in a big square box. Who puts a sofa in a box??? The reviews were good but I am not sure what age group purchased this product. Assembly fairly easy needs two people. No support when sitting and the seat cushions were much larger than needed to be. Want to return it...not problem but could not repack this product in the original packing because of expansion of cushions when opened. I did get a refund but with a lot of questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Not bad looking once it finally got together. The side holes not drilled correctly. Had to modify and cut the fabric to get it together. Would have returned it but having people over and no time for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Cushions sag and slip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch a year ago. It was comfortable at first but now the back cushions have sagged/been scrunched down to the point that you can't sit upright. The cushions aren't firm enough to hold their shape. Also the cushions you sit on slide out with every use; every time I come back to sit down I fluff the rear cushions and slide the lower cushions back in. Very annoying. I would not buy this couch again. I recommend going up to a slightly more expensive couch as this one will surely irritate you.
customer_reviews.author: Dima Smirnoff

customer_reviews.title: Almost great but a snafu takes off one star.
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, comfortable, and very easy-to-assemble piece of furniture, a welcome addition to my living room. A couple of parts were missing, what I gather to be spacers for installation of the center legs. The supplier was to send the missing part but instead sent legs without the spacers. When I inquired again, Amazon took 20% off the price and said that's all they could do unless I wanted to return it for a refund. I chose to keep the love seat and so far it has been just fine. I did take off one star because of the missing part and the inability to correct such a seemingly simple problem.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: broken pieces/ no customer service to help fix problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch and was very excited for it. One of the seat cushions had a broken zipper as soon as it came out of the box. Now, SERTA says they are unable to help me and Amazon keeps giving me the SERTA number to ask them for help and services/ for replacement. In the box there was a flyer with a service number on it through truecustomersupport.com or 18553722315. They told me over the phone that they do not service this product. This makes no sense to me and is extremely frustrating. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable loveseat ever. Don't buy it! You sit in it and it swallows you and you feel like you just wrestled a bear in it....you stand up and it LOOKS like you wrestled a bear in it!!! You have to adjust all the cushions. Looks horrible! The stuffing goes to one side or the other so then you have a huge hole in the seat. Came in a tiny box you have to put together. The best it ever looked was in the box! In fact...if you get it...just sit on the box!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice budget-friendly couch
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good couch. It is easy to put together and the fabric seems pretty high quality. I have two complaints though: -This couch does not have a solid back, but fabric flaps which connect at the bottom with Velcro. My cats find this fascinating and periodically unfasten the Velcro and hide inside the back of the couch. - The cushions on the back of the couch are a little too squishy and don't bounce back to their normal shape once you've rested against them. They require constant "fluffing".
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Tiny House Approved
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy to put together. It’s the kind of couch you can fall asleep on. The color is a great neutral brown and it fits perfectly in a tiny house.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Don't Let Your Dog Near It
customer_reviews.text: I mean I guess you get what you pay for. It's not very comfortable and the cushions are constantly slipping forward. My dog spent five minutes with it and chewed the arm down to the wood because there really isn't that much there. So after a year, I am thinking it is time to retire this couch (which sucks because yes it was cheap but it should have lasted longer than a year.) We bought it for our basement and it works, I just wouldn't rave about it and I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: RobinFromCle

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: MISSING PARTS. CHEAP NAPPUY FABRIC. WORSE THAN IKEA QUALITY. CRAPPY BLACK SHEER NYLON AT BASE AND BACK ALSO ON UNDERSIDE OF PILLOWS AND CUSHIONS, CANT BE TURNED OVER. 3+ WEEKS TO DELIVER AND ZERO CUSTOMER SUPPORT. SHAME. SERTA USED TO MEAN SOMETHING!! DO NOT WASTE YORU MONEY OR TIME!!
customer_reviews.author: amillernyc

customer_reviews.title: Not the best but not the worst, either.
customer_reviews.text: The couch came with NO instructions. You have to watch the video to get information. It was pretty easy to put together, however, has a terrible odor, and the seat cushions slide off easily, I can't get them to stay in place. I needed something cheap to just make it through a year or 2 until I move and this couch was decent enough, but if you're looking for comfort and quality, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but missing parts and customer service is no help.
customer_reviews.text: The couch is great for the price, and is quite comfy. Unfortunately the arms on the one I received did not go together correctly due to a missing part on the right side. I was hoping I could call customer service and just get the replace metal part, which screws onto the side of the couch. Customer service hotline was not help at all and said I would need to send it back. It is quite heavy, and the box is gone, so returning it is more trouble than it's worth. I will have to build something to keep the couch together! Very frustrating experience.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This couch is exactly as described, well built, easy to put together and looks good. The only problem is that it's too shallow for my liking. To actually sit on the couch I actually take off the back cushions for me to fit and I'm pretty average size (6ft, 170lbs). I cannot recommend this couch unless you are less than 5' tall or don't mind taking off the back cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Mech22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our media room.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought this couch to for a media room. I measured the space and double check to make sure I had enough space. It fit perfect. I was nervous with the pictures online and reviews...but I'm glad I bought it anyway. It's perfect. It took me about 30 minutes to put together. It was easy. Trust me it's worth the money. And I'm picky.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a sofa for small space and this fit the room. It was packaged well and simple enough to assemble, looks nice too. BUT...this has to be the most uncomfortable sofa I've ever sat on! I called it the midget couch. Seats are not deep enough so you feel like you are always falling forward. Cushions slip out every time you sit down. Back cushion is too soft...more pillowish and they flatten out too much...hurts your back to sit because there's no support. I bought the mini sofa and the love seat. Got rid of them both after 7 months. Very, very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something small and temporary for a small room or apartment then this is perfect. Super easy to assemble. I put it together myself in less than a couple hours. However it doesn't have much depth to it at all and I'm pretty short person.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Salam

customer_reviews.title: I like this couch
customer_reviews.text: I like this couch. I read reviews on Amazon before this and don't know why it hadn't gotten more 5 stars. The couch is exactly as pictured and was so easy to install. I'm surprised how durable it seems to be with two adults easily sitting on. Perfect for the little corner we had planned for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Montano

customer_reviews.title: Not built for anyone over 5'9"...
customer_reviews.text: The couch feels reasonably comfortable and sturdy. My issue is with the size of the seat cushions and the couch as a whole. It seems to be built for people 5'9" and below. I am 6'2" and cannot sit comfortably in it, if the cushions extended out 4-6" it would be fine. There was a slight odor when it was first unwrapped, but that has gone away after 24-48 hours...just as other reviews have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C.

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: So I understand why someone said this couch was a great addition to their office waiting room. LOL. It is not very deep. You can't exactly curl up on it. But you can sit straight up on it just fine. I am only 5'3" and even I find it to be a bit small. I can tell that the back cushions are going to be flattened and oddly shaped after a while but all in all, it's not hideous, it was cheap and conveniently delivered to my doorstep (upstairs) and SUPER, SUPER easy to put together! Can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: JennyMarie

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose for this price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this loveseat for a sitting room, so it won't get heavy use. We were surprised by how small the box was when delivered. Everything about this needed to be assembled. It was easy enough to do and we completed it in 15 minutes. It looks great and is comfortable for sitting (not so much lounging). We are happy with the purchase and the price!
customer_reviews.author: DMSlagSkal

customer_reviews.title: The couch is very easy to fix and really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The couch is very easy to fix and really comfortable. It actually deserves 5 stars but one of the back covers and a throw pillow had very flimsy stitch and tore very easily with regular usage (in a week's time). I didn't even find the customer care contact anywhere, hence giving it 2 stars. Otherwise its a total VFM couch.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most uncomfortable sofa I have ever sat in and it looks incredibly cheap. The seat cushions are like sitting on soft pillows, and the back cushions are so full they push you forward. I am going to try and return because I honestly just want to push it out to the curb. I don't know if I'm more bothered at the waste of money or the time spent putting together this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to for a cheaply made couch
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're in college, buying a couch in a box is NEVER a good idea. The couch is cheaply made in which i already have indentations on the arms where there is not support underneath, the material that covers the base springs to the couch cushions has tor, and the back cushions do not easily keep their shape. Additionally, couch does not have the same gray material all throughout, so if something happens to a cushion, your couch looks a wreck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$$
customer_reviews.text: I kinda hate this couch. I bought the Loveseat for use in the basement tv room (not used very often). The back pillows are so puffy that it pushes you to sit forward on the edge of the seat. I am not a very big person, usually I am complaining that furniture makes me feel like a little kid. The low armrests do not make it comfortable to lay on the couch. I have only sat on it a handful,of times due to it not being comfortable. I take the back pillows off so I can sit far enough back or lay more comfortably. Buying stuff online without trying is always a gamble-this time I lost. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Ryndi

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS COUCH!!! A. The couch comes in one shipment and the back cushions and hardware is a second mythological box that never shows up that is apparently sent from another manufacturer. I called Amazon 6 times, my wife called, we have email and chat logs from Amazon customer support, but we just keep getting the run around. Amazon won't step up and take responsibility, and neither does Serta (manufacturer), or UPS. B. Couch is incredibly uncomfortable.. However it's slightly more comfortable than a towel or maybe a flattened cardboard box. So there's that. C. We've learned a lesson about buying furniture from Amazon and will not do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Ok for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: I am glad this piece is in my seldom-used "formal" living room. I am not sure what I expected for a some-assembly-required sofa, but it certainly wouldn't hold up to daily use. It also had a really strong chemical smell from the foam cushions, that dissipated in a few days. On the plus side, the fabric is a really nice color & it was fairly simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia Saaler

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and it looks goods. I would like it more if the cushions were reversible but they aren't. The cushions don't spring back as they should but are relatively comfortable. The fabric is not very pet friendly and will quickly snag if a cat gets too interested in it. The sofa is large enough for a nap for average sized person. Overall, I'm pleased with this purchase. It's not perfect and not too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkiecat

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a shoe piece, but for the size and price it’s not supposed to be. It’s small, but exactly what I needed. The cushions could use more fluff, but it may loosen up over time. It was very easy to put together. The box cams pretty beat up, but nothing inside was harmed. It’s very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Xeek

customer_reviews.title: A fluke? A significant one.
customer_reviews.text: Missing brackets in the base frame that is supposed to hold the back frame in place. The left bottom frame had the brackets, the right bottom frame was missing the brackets. This caused the back to flop around and twist. Called customer service included in the paperwork and was advised to return it. So I did.
customer_reviews.author: hidden

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that purchasing a Serta sofa online was a safe bet. I was wrong. The quality of the sofa is poor. Very uncomfortable to sit on. Unsturdy. Very cheap looking in person. I was EXTREMELY disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: D Scott Collins

customer_reviews.title: Couch
customer_reviews.text: This couch looks Nothing like the picture at all. It is made Very Cheaply and Not worth the price I paid for it. Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Viertel

customer_reviews.title: It is a couch in a box.
customer_reviews.text: Lol. This is a couch? Great packing job. Open the box - the rest really is easy. The cushions expand quickly. Instructions clear. No tools needed. Couch is 78". Sitting space closer to 65" with the arms. Suggested weight limit 250 lbs per cushion for a total of 500 lbs at the time on the couch. Comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a box and needs some easy assembly. Not deep enough for a 5' tall woman to sit in comfortably- it feels like you're being pushed off the couch by the back cushions. Not long enough to lay down on comfortably. Too short -very low to the ground. Some pluses: nice fabric, and very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. They’re cheap and uncomfortable. I don’t think they’ll last long. Every time i sit down i hear the Velcro coming apart and sticking back together. Cushions move a lot. Did i say these are cheap? I mean they are cheaply made and cheap to purchase, but you probably won’t be happy with them. *****Update***** after a couple months i can certify these are the worst couches around. Had to change my review from 2 stars to 1. Hopefully this review saves Simone else from wasting their money. Don’t buy this....it’s a terrible couch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Glade

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, After the big flood of 2016 i purchased 3 of these.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal and you can take it apart to bring upstairs one person easy. It comes in sections and you dont need tools. well made and we live in a house 12ft above ground. i can bring upstairs without a struggle, alone without calling friends to help. It is better than average quality and a bang for the buck. I am sure you can buy a sofa for 1,000 bucks thats more fun to sit on, but we are happy. Good Luck From Brian in Baton Rouge
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Good deal & comfy, but came with MANY defects!
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, I bought this couch used, so I get why it didn't come with instructions, especially since it was still fairly easy to assemble. However, it came with these defects that I was unaware of when I bought it: the wooden legs were very scuffed (the black paint was chipped in many places); one of the pieces of wood in one of the back cushions was snapped in half, so the two back cushions don't fasten together properly; there is a fingernail-sized brown stain on one of the front couch cushions that is very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: What a great loveseat!
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat came in one box! We assembled it in a hour. My husband was worried when I told him I bought it online but was amazed by the sturdy construction and quality of it. Listen people this is an apartment style loveseat, small with low profile but it is perfect for living in the country with animals who love to share seating with you. Easy clean up! Love this and will buy again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS SOFA
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is not good at all. It is missing a board in the back right side so doesnt feel right when you sit down. The zipper has broken on the bottom right cushion. I am very upset with the quality of this item. Really want to send back but not sure how much shipping would cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good couch, poor fulfillment
customer_reviews.text: Couch is as pictured, and is worth the money. The fulfillment of this product left more to be desired. Holes in shipping the box, loose silica everywhere in the product and box, dents/scratches on the wooden legs and holes in the under upholstery and interior cushion. Do yourself a favor and don’t order this product online.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic; no frills/compact loveseat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fill a corner of my roomy apartment. I do not sit on it. It's rather lumpy. BUT it is stylish and was easy/fun to assemble. I think if I used it more, it would wear in and eventually be a comfy spot. Otherwise, it looks nice & fulfills the purpose I desired. If you really want a cozy spot to hang out, shop IKEA sofas.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Neat, Compact & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a new sofa for my small space for a long time. i wanted something to fit my whole family but shouldnt be too bulky. the few I saw were either very clumsy or very ugly looking or not the color i wanted. this has all the qualities I was looking for! wide enough, lightweight, compact, comfortable, very elegant, beautiful color, practical and best of all; so affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but just for sitting.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed an inexpensive loveseat for my apartment. It was fairly easy to assemble but we had to use a drill to screw in some of the screws. You can't lie down on it unless you're short but for the money it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: njjames

customer_reviews.title: great sofa took me about 45 min to put together
customer_reviews.text: great sofa took me about 45 min to put together ,by myself. i was lucky i only pay 255 for it,on sale,but it worth more . Get it if on sale or even if not on sale. it is made for smaller people i am 5"7 it just the right size other sofa that are bigger is bad for my back
customer_reviews.author: jjwwkk

customer_reviews.title: Great Sofa
customer_reviews.text: Couch in a box...who knew it would look so good! As soon as I can and cross fingers they don't sell out on the love seat, I will buy that next. I live on a third floor older house and worried about getting any couch up the twisting stairs. It comes in a box...really! My son and his friend took the pieces out to bring up stairs. No screws, no bolts, just click it...is how pieces got together. Fantastic idea and its not cheesy. My son and friends, weight over two hundred pounds each, all over six foot tall. Big boys, and can sit without it creeking or shifting. Great buy is all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: facefind

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: Not manufactured well at all! Fabric twisted. Connection holes do not line up. I'm disappointed but thank God, I have carpentry skills. I'm gonna fix it. This sofa is worth no more than $250. That's being generous.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Little Pricey But Cute
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey for what you get. Legs are plastic. Filling is cheap. Back of couch is hollow and just material hanging down. Looks cute but not sure it will hold two people.

customer_reviews.title: Truly disappointing and poorly made! Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product due to the positive reviews, but I was truly disappointed. It fits appropriately in my small junior bedroom apartment in NYC, but it is so poorly made that it's almost embarrassing to have guests sit on it. I don't imagine anyone over 150lbs could sit on this without significant discomfort. It constantly sinks into the middle and the pillows have already starting coming apart. So shoddily made. I will be throwing this out when I move.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie L.

customer_reviews.title: Great solution.  Difficulty assembling completely.
customer_reviews.text: If you need a sofa in a box to get up stairs and around corners, this is a great couch. I like the looks. It's a bit firm and I couldn't get the back to attach on the sides. Holes did not line up. I'll work on it some more--likely drilling new holes. It's in my office, so it works for my needs and those of my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Banks

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, uncomfortable sofa
customer_reviews.text: The sofa is flimsy and not well made at all. The hand rest broke within a couple of months and there is a large depression in the hand rest area. This happened without any kind of weight being placed on the hand rest other than my hand 😞. The cushions do not stay in place and slide off every time you get up. So you have to first adjust the cushions and then sit every time. It’s super uncomfortable. Very unhappy with this purchase - was expecting a good quality product from Serta brand.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: This Sofa is a Piece of Crap.
customer_reviews.text: First the back covering sags and after barely being used one of the seat zippers burst and the cushion was more than half exposed. Also the seating space is small. Do not, I repeat do not order this item. You will be sorely disappointed. I ordered it for our office and now I need to figure out how to return it or get my money back. I'll send a photo as soon as someone at my office can send it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Emphasis:  This is a Love Seat not Sofa
customer_reviews.text: it’s important to emphasize this is a love seat not a sofa. If you are a tall person wanting to use this as a sofa would not recommend. I am 5’8 and if lying down My feet hang over the edge fully extended. Assembly is fairly easy and product arrives in one large box. The material quality is comfortable. Overall nice product but would prefer something much larger.
customer_reviews.author: RCF1978

customer_reviews.title: Great for short people
customer_reviews.text: The back of this sofa, which is really more like a love seat, is just not tall enough. You will need to buy some extra pillows to make this couch work. It is not too expensive, so if you need something in this price range for a short term, it's OK, but lower your expectations to avoid disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Enterprising Reader

customer_reviews.title: What I hoped for for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This loveseat is exactly what I expected at the price point. It is very comfortable. It was easy to put together. However, it is not really sturdy. I'll be surprised if it lasts five years. But it filled a need that I have right now, so I am please.
customer_reviews.author: lnisw

customer_reviews.title: This couch was easy to put together but broke after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I am back to change my review. Originally I gave this 4 stars. 8 months after we purchased this, the wood that supported the middle leg cracked. There was no way to fix it as the poly wood that this couch is made of is split. We only have one couch and cannot afford another. We took the legs off and now have the couch sitting on the floor without the legs. Disappointed. I thought this would last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: CHIGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Decent with a simple modification
customer_reviews.text: Couple of tips to avoid the issues you'll read about in the reviews: First, after our together to back and tighten every bolt to properly secure loveseat together. Second, take a thin piece of plywood 47 x 19 and place under seat cushions, you'll be glad you did (cushions are thick enough that it won't be noticed).
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this couch is trying to dump me on the floor. Something seems hinky with the back cushions?? It was fairly easy to assemble, but it’s NOT very comfortable. Also, I received a call from UPS and they wouldn’t deliver the package because it was too heavy. I ended up paying a moving company to pick up the sofa. All in, I could’ve gotten a much nicer sofa that made me fee welcomed when sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Where are the cushions! I ordered this couch and ...
customer_reviews.text: Where are the cushions! I ordered this couch and it was delivered without the stuffing for the back pillows. I called in and they reodered me another one. Lo and behold, the sofa again came without the pillow inserts. They still have not picked up the first one so I had to cut the cushion up in the 1st sofa to stuff the new one. This is so ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: angela ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice-frame not well done
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch in September. While you have to switch the couch cushions once a week to prevent a ‘hole’ in the middle if you want to lay, it was doing what I needed. However, I realized that the back middle leg broke off after only a month and I was unable to put back on. Now when you sit down, the couch tilts backwards unless you ease into it and all other bolts holding the two sections together are weakening. I feel at some point in the next month or so I will sit down and all holding it together will go. Maybe I got a lemon, but that’s my take after five months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa DC

customer_reviews.title: Such great value! Really easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Such great value! Really easy to assemble. Be careful when you are opening the box as they have many little "freshness balls" that escape the packaging and run all over your floor. The back cushions sag a little, but not bad and overall the couch is comfortable. It's a little short for lots of overnight guests and folks who have slept on it give it mixed reviews in that area.
customer_reviews.author: srmc

customer_reviews.title: Bad support. Causing backpain. Not worth the price. There are much better options for $100 more.
customer_reviews.text: I never usually leave a feedback but this one(chestnut brown bonded leather) i had to leave one. Had it for about 4 months Like: easy assembly. Appears decent quality bonded leather. Dislike: doesnt do what a sofa is supposed to do i.e support and minimum comfort the person sitting on it. The cushions are just too strong and bumpy so just throws any person out or makes you slip down with slippery leather. Although sofa is wide, no one can really sit in the center. Also noticing back pain. Basically design problem rather than faulty item. Will try to reach out to Serta.
customer_reviews.author: sujit

customer_reviews.title: We've had futons that were made better. Easy to assemble which was appreciated
customer_reviews.text: Looks much lighter gray upon delivery. One of the cushions was torn and the fabric the back had holes in it. Very cheaply made. Not worth the cost. We would expect to pay around $150 for this piece of furniture. We've had futons that were made better. Easy to assemble which was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: K. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: awful GARBAGE. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This couch is flimsy. The armrest broke within the first 24 hours. I had to replace. Waste of money. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: The_Bee_Keeper

customer_reviews.title: Terrible color, incredibly uncomfortable. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Color looks nothing like the picture provided. Much darker, almost mocha color. Arrived in a surprisingly compact box and easily assembled, which was nice. More of a loveseat given the size. Incredibly uncomfortable and way too small to lay down by yourself on, let alone with a pet or spouse. Kept it around due to finances for a year, but was more than thrilled to bring to Goodwill after that!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure why this sofa got good reviews. I think its a terrible sofa
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this sofa got good reviews. I think its a terrible sofa. First opening the box, hundreds maybe thousand brown pellets fell all over the place. Since I have wooden floors, it rolled everywhere! Second, this sofa has little depth. I don't think I have that big of a butt, but I feel like I'm sitting on the edge of the sofa. I should have known better since the sofa was only 257 dollars. As they say, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Joo

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and out of a reasonable option
customer_reviews.text: The right side of the sofa will not click into place. Called the manufacturer and they said it's a framing issue and would have to be returned. I'm a single woman, the sofa was vacuum sealed. It's impossible to repackage for return. Very disappointed and out of a reasonable option. Bad manufacturing serta! Thanks for the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Schantey Hefner Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Slippery cushions
customer_reviews.text: The back cushions are too flappy and the velcro that holds them in place makes an awful noise when moved accidentally. The lower cushions are okay, maybe a tiny bit too firm... but they slide out forward because they're sitting on really slippery material. If the velcro was on the bottom instead of the top it might work better. It also arrived with broken zipper on one cover, but the company sent me a replacement with no problem (kind of sucks I had to wait a week).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am disappointed. I should have known not to buy a couch without trying it out. My mistake. I am somewhat impressed by the engineering it took to pack a couch in such a small box..but the trade off is that there no way to ever get it back in if you are inclined to return it. As far as the feel, it sits shallow and the back is straight. It’s not comfortable for me, but YMMV. I hope that once the cushions get used it will get better, but for now it looks a lot better than it feels.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: This couch was really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This couch was really easy to put together, it took me about 30 minutes by myself. I got the glacial gray color, and it's exactly like the picture. It's a bit firm, but overall pretty comfortable! I'm about 5'10 and I can lay down comfortably if I curl a little or put my head on the arm rest. The packaging was also nice, as I live in an apartment with small doorways and halls.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best Couch <$400
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write product reviews, but let's just be honest. Serta comfort (yes it's comfy as hell) + easy to assemble + delivered to my door = best 400 dollar couch on the market. As a side note: I am 5'10" and I tried sleeping on the couch for one evening, it was bearable, but I found it just a bit short to be a viable sleeping option for me. No star deductions though because it's not supposed to be a sleeper. Just wanted to help inform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Serta Palisades Upholstered Sofas for Living Room Modern Design Couch, Straight Arms, Soft Fabric Upholstery, Tool-Free Assembly, 78", Brown
product_meta.description: Size:78" Sofa| Color:BrownCreated to suit small living spaces, the Serta Palisades Collection 78" Sofa brings functional style and affordable comfort to your home decor. Its compact size and unique, tool-free assembly make it a great seating solution for apartments, offices and dorms. In addition to making small spaces feel larger, its straight arms, trendy fabrics and square espresso footers brings a modern flair to your living room, guestroom or home office. Quality hardwood materials deliver strength and stability while individually wrapped coils and pillowed back cushions offer a cozy, supportive seating you can relax back into. Designed to match pieces in the Palisades Collection, this Serta loveseat can be combined with another sofa, loveseat and accent chair for a completely coordinated look.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: This couch adds modern flair to family rooms, living areas, and more
SOFT, COMFY COUCH: Supportive memory foam and pillowy back cushions embody luxurious comfort you can sink into
EVERYDAY VERSATILITY: Modern sofa is great for entertaining, reading, studying, or simply relaxing
DURABLE HARDWOOD CONSTRUCTION: Sturdy design supported with quality hardwood materials
EASY ASSEMBLY: Quick tool-free assembly for easy setup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars1,197 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
